name: Mr. Lampkin never going under
description:
Mr. Lampkin Never Going Under

Game inspired by horror stories

Main Feature: You are in complete darkness, the only thing that illuminates your path is a flashlight and only on it you can see the monsters

There is no any hp or ammo bars. All this you will be checking by yourself. Find keys, ammo packs and medipacks. Survive. Have fun (idk).

IMPORTANT TO READ:

Esc - Pause 

Open  nw.exe for game

If you see big red screen try to reopen .exe file

If you cant exit the game, try to use Alt+F4 or Task Manager
